00036 bool Bot::run() {
00037 
00038    signalTerm();
00039    JID jid(this->login);
00040    j = new Client(jid, pass);
00041    j->registerConnectionListener(this);
00042    j->registerMessageHandler(this);
00043    j->rosterManager()->registerRosterListener(this);
00044    j->disco()->registerDiscoHandler(this);
00045    j->disco()->setVersion("JabInfo", "0.1.2", "UBUNTU"); //zaobrazi se v infu, nazev, verze, system
00046    j->disco()->setIdentity( "client", "bot" );
00047    j->disco()->addFeature( "http://jabber.org/protocol/tune+notify");
00048    j->disco()->addFeature( "http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub");
00049    j->disco()->addFeature( "http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#event");
00050    j->disco()->addFeature( "http://jabber.org/protocol/mood+notify");
00051    j->disco()->addFeature( "http://jabber.org/protocol/geoloc+notify");
00052    j->disco()->addFeature( "http://jabber.org/protocol/activity+notify");
00053 
00054    j->registerStanzaExtension( new PubSub::Event(NULL) );
00055    j->setPresence( Presence::Available, 5 );   //Nastaveni statusuvailable
00056    j->registerPresenceHandler( this );
00057    j->registerIqHandler(this, ExtVersion);
00058    j->registerIqHandler(this, ExtDiscoItems );
00059    j->registerIqHandler(this, ExtDiscoInfo);
00060    j->logInstance().registerLogHandler(LogLevelDebug, LogAreaAll, this);
00061    StringList ca;
00062    ca.push_back( "/pathto/cacert.crt" );
00063    j->setCACerts(ca);
00064    m_vManager = new VCardManager(j);
00065    database = new Database();
00066    database->start();
00067 
00068    j->connect(false);  //kontrola spojeni se servrem
00069    while(true)
00070    {
00071       j->recv();
00072       if( f_global == true )
00073       {
00074          end();
00075          break;
00076       }
00077    }
00078    
00079    delete(m_vManager);
00080    delete(j);
00081    delete(database);
00082 }

00131 void Bot::handleRoster( const Roster& roster ) {
00132 
00133    Roster::const_iterator it = roster.begin();
00134    for( ; it != roster.end(); ++it )
00135    {
00136       m_vManager->fetchVCard((*it).second->jid(), this);
00137       database->insertTableUser((*it).second->jid());
00138    }
00139 }

00163 void Bot::handleMessage( const Message& msg, MessageSession * /*session=0*/ ) {
00164    
00165    const PubSub::Event* pse = msg.findExtension<PubSub::Event>( ExtPubSubEvent );
00166    JID jid(msg.from());
00167    if( pse )
00168    {
00169       if(pse->type() == gloox::PubSub::EventItems)
00170       {
00171          Tag* p_tag = (pse->tag()->findChild("items"))->clone();
00172          string p_str = p_tag->findAttribute( "node" );
00173          if( p_str == "http://jabber.org/protocol/geoloc" )
00174          {
00175             Geoloc* geoloc = new Geoloc( p_tag );
00176             geoloc->jid(jid.full());
00177             database->insertTableGeoloc(geoloc);
00178          }
00179          else if( p_str == "http://jabber.org/protocol/tune" )
00180          {
00181             Tune* tune = new Tune( p_tag );
00182             tune->jid(jid.full());
00183             database->insertTableTune(tune);
00184          }
00185          else if( p_str == "http://jabber.org/protocol/mood" )
00186          {
00187             Mood* mood = new Mood( p_tag );
00188             mood->jid(jid.full());
00189             database->insertTableMood(mood);
00190          }
00191          else if( p_str == "http://jabber.org/protocol/activity" )
00192          {
00193             Activity* activity = new Activity( p_tag );
00194             activity->jid(jid.full());
00195             database->insertTableActivity(activity);
00196          }
00197       }
00198    }
00199    else if( !msg.body().empty() )
00200    {
00201       database->insertTableMessage( jid.bare().c_str(),  msg.body().c_str(),  msg.subject().c_str(), msg.thread().c_str(), messageSubtype(msg.subtype()).c_str() );
00202       int comm = command( msg.body(), jid.bare());
00203       if( comm == 1 )
00204       {
00205          std::cout<<"jsme zdddddddddddddddd"<<std::endl;
00206          if( msg.body() == COMMAND_USER )
00207          {
00208             Message mess( gloox::Message::Chat, msg.from(), database->printUser() );
00209             j->send( mess );
00210          }
00211          else if( msg.body() == COMMAND_RECONNECT )
00212             end();
00213       }
00214       else if( comm == 2)
00215       {
00216          Message mess( gloox::Message::Chat, msg.from(), NO_RIGHT);
00217          j->send( mess );
00218       }
00219       else if( comm == 3 )
00220       {
00221          Message mess( gloox::Message::Chat, msg.from(), database->select(msg.body(), msg.from().bare()));
00222          j->send( mess );
00223       }
00224    }
00225 }

00227 void Bot::handleLog( LogLevel level, LogArea area, const std::string& message ) {
00228 
00229    printf( "log level :%d, area :%d, %s\n", level, area, message.c_str() );
00230    if( area == LogAreaXmlIncoming || area == LogAreaXmlOutgoing )
00231       database->insertTableXML( level, area, message );
00232    else// if( area == LogAreaClassDns )         //Debagovaci zprava
00233       database->insertTableDebug( level, area, message );
00234 }

00237 void Bot::handleVCard( const JID& jid, const VCard* v) {
00238 // podivat jestli je dobre to V, jestli vubec nekdy nastane ze je prazdne
00239    if( !v ) //vcard je prazdny
00240       database->insertTableUser(jid.bare());
00241    else
00242    {
00243       database->insertTableVCard( v, jid.bare() );
00244       database->insertTableUser(jid.bare());
00245    }
00246 }

00257 void Bot::handleDiscoInfo( const JID& jidPom/*iq*/, const Disco::Info& info, int /*context*/ ) {
00258 
00259    Tag *queryTag = info.tag()->clone();
00260    SwVersion * swVersion = new SwVersion();
00261    swVersion->jid(jidPom.full());
00262    if( queryTag->findAttribute("xmlns") == "http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#info" )
00263    {
00264       bool update = false;
00265       if(queryTag->hasChild("identity") )
00266       {
00267          update = true;
00268          Tag *identTag = queryTag->findChild("identity")->clone();
00269          swVersion->parserTagI( identTag );
00270       }
00271       if( queryTag->hasChild("x") )
00272       {
00273          update = true;
00274          Tag *xTag =  (queryTag->findChild("x"))->clone();
00275          swVersion->parserTagX( xTag );
00276       }
00277 
00278       if( queryTag->hasChild("feature") )
00279       {
00280          update = true;
00281          swVersion->parserTagF( queryTag );
00282       }
00283 
00284       if( update )
00285       {
00286          database->updateTableResource( swVersion );
00287          swVersion->clear();
00288       }
00289    }
00290 }

00299 bool Bot::handleIq( const IQ &iq ) {
00300 
00301    if( (iq.tag()->findChild("query")))// && iq.tag()->findAttribute("type") != "error" )
00302    {
00303       Tag *queryTag = (iq.tag()->findChild("query"))->clone();
00304 
00305       SwVersion * swVersion = new SwVersion();
00306       JID jidPom( iq.tag()->findAttribute("from") );
00307       swVersion->jid(jidPom.full());
00308       if( queryTag->findAttribute("xmlns") == XMLNS_VERSION )
00309       {
00310          swVersion->parserTagVer( queryTag );
00311          database->updateTableResource( jidPom.bare(), jidPom.resource(), swVersion->name(), swVersion->version(), swVersion->os());
00312          swVersion->clear();
00313       }
00314    }
00315 }

00322 // Reakce na zmenu statusu uzivatele v kontakt listu
00323 void Bot::handlePresence( const Presence& presence) {
00324 
00325    JID jidFull = presence.from();
00326 
00327    Roster* roster = j->rosterManager()->roster();
00328    if( roster->find(jidFull.bare()) != roster->end() )   //kontrola ze to poslal nekdo ze seznamu jiaignorace
00329    {
00330       if( presence.subtype() != 5 )
00331       {
00332 
00333          SwVersion * swVersion = new SwVersion();
00334          swVersion->jid(jidFull.full());
00335          database->insertTablePresence( jidFull.bare(), presence.status(), jidFull.username(), jidFull.resource(), presenceString(presence.subtype()), presence.priority(),
00336                                         swVersion->name(), swVersion->version(), swVersion->os() );
00337          swVersion->clear();
00338          if( (presence.findExtension( ExtCaps )) != 0 )
00339          {
00340             bool newResource = true;
00341             bool update = false;
00342             
00343             Tag * capTag = (presence.findExtension( ExtCaps ))->tag()->clone();
00344             if( capTag->hasAttribute("ver") )
00345             {
00346                string ver = capTag->findAttribute("ver");
00347                map<string, string>::iterator it;
00348                it = database->listVer.find(jidFull.full());
00349                if( it != database->listVer.end() )
00350                {
00351                   if( ver == it->second ) // je vse aktualni
00352                   {
00353                      update = database->updateTableResource( jidFull.bare(), presenceString(presence.subtype()), presence.status(), jidFull.resource(), presence.priority());
00354                      newResource = false;
00355                   }
00356                }
00357                else
00358                   database->listVer.insert(make_pair(string(jidFull.full()), string(ver)));
00359                if( !update || newResource )
00360                {
00361                   database->listVer[jidFull.full()] = ver;
00362                   j->send( swVersion->createIqStanza( this->login, jidFull.bare(), jidFull.resource()) );         // poslani dotazi na software verzi XEP-0092
00363                   j->disco()->getDiscoInfo(jidFull.full(),"", this,1,"");
00364                   database->updateTableResource( jidFull.bare(), presenceString(presence.subtype()), presence.status(), jidFull.resource(), presence.priority(), ver);
00365                }
00366             }
00367          }
00368       }
00369       else
00370       {
00371          database->insertTablePresence( jidFull.bare(), presence.status(), jidFull.username(), jidFull.resource(), presenceString(presence.subtype()) );
00372          database->updateTableResource( jidFull.bare(), presenceString(presence.subtype()), presence.status(), jidFull.resource());
00373       }
00374       database->updateTableStatus(jidFull.bare());             // aktualizace tabulky Status na zakldade tabuly resource
00375    }
00376 }
